name: Hira
description: Some gems have hidden qualities beyond their luster, beyond their shine... Hira is one of those gems.

name: Motti
description: Origin of the Motti is pearl .., hence its low value. It has a very high shine and 12 sides, however.

name: Panna
description: Panna is our most coveted and sought after gem. You will pay much to be the proud owner of this gorgeous and high shine gem.
